channel.title: Privacy on Rishabh Jain
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Rishabh Jain

item.title: They Can Smell What You are Cooking
item.description: After the recent Facebook–Cambridge Analytica data scandal, that cost the privacy of 87 million Facebook users, the need for concrete measures to protect online privacy has become more urgent than ever. The event was a grim reminder — if you’re not paying for it, you are the product. In the light of it, a lot of organizations, government and private, have come forward to enforce the right to data privacy.
